content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

<question>
You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.
</question>

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    julia_code = ""
    block_start = false
    for line in eachline(md)
        if startswith(line, "```julia")
            block_start = true
            continue
        elseif startswith(line, "```")
            block_start = false
            continue
        elseif block_start
            julia_code *= line * "\n"
        end
    end
    return strip(julia_code)
end
```
